title: Foundational Systems Engineering Activities to Support ITS Procurement
description: This training guides transportation professionals in applying systems engineering to advance ITS project development with a focus on planning and needs-based scoping. Click to contact the ITS PCB Program.

title: FHWA-NHI-133133: Planning for TSMO - Putting Concepts into Action
description: This web conference training session builds on Course 2 (NHI-133132) and uses interactive activities to engage participants and bring the concepts of planning for TSMO to life.
